summary: A test module that rigorously validates the DPMSolverMultistepScheduler (and related diffusion schedulers) across a wide range of configurations, including custom timesteps, solver orders, prediction and variance types, noise handling, FP16 precision, and model checkpoint loading.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of diffusion model schedulers in production pipelines by detecting regressions and ensuring they behave as expected under diverse scenarios.
